channel.title: How to prune your twitter account
channel.description:
http://ianlandsman.com/prune-twitter-account/
This recently came up on a thread with @Andy. I said my level of following was workable, but on vacation I realized it was crazy :smile:
So this is how I regained control of twitter.

item.title: How to prune your twitter account
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
We’re all going to check now, too see if we’ve ‘pruned’. ;0)

Read full topic
item.source: How to prune your twitter account
